text:
@NYGovCuomo @luciahoff Mr.Cuomo, if covid-19 gets worse, do you think it is a wise decision to held an international event such as US Open in September? No matter how precautions will be executed even perfectly, it still looks risky to do it, what do you think?
#newyork #usopen
